item.title: Blog - Reviewing code from a project I designed/coded 8 years ago
item.description: One of the first projects I worked on after learning how to program, around 8 years ago, is called a href="https://github.com/KeikakuB/writerator/tree/legacy">writeratora>. It is a Python command line interface (or CLI for short) for analyzing English language text and generating randomized poetry such as haikus>>

item.title: Blog - How to build your own website for 17$ or less
item.description:
The website you're reading this on was built by myself and it cost me a total of 17$ CDN (yearly). Without a custom domain it would have cost me nothing, zilch, nada.
My goal for this website was to create my own space on the internet to allow me to>>

item.title: Blog - Influencing the odds inside and outside of Blood Bowl 2
item.description:
